name: Daisy Dangerous (securas)
description:
Daisy Dangerous is action platformer where the main character has limited resources to handle a set of
robot-overrun, trap-infested stages.

Daisy Dangerous was developed as a fan game of the 1989 classic Rick Dangerous. This playable demo is a tribute to that game by adapting the stages of its first level.

This is a pre-alpha demo. Please be patient with bugs.
I'll squash them as soon as I can.
Thanks to everyone that took the time to test and comment.
You are AWESOME!
